extendedInfo.description: Crosswords with themes! 125 high quality crossword puzzles with cleverly constructed, humorous themes and relatively easy clues with more puzzles coming soon.  That sums up Crossword Rush. Watch the short Youtube video below!  UPDATE: 3 optional crossword puzzle packs added.As seen on Facebook and throughout the Internet, by popular demand resident constructor Harald Hornung has finally released his cleverly fun, themed crosswords in the Play Store.  On par with Shortyz and NY Times style crosswords, these puzzles stand out far above the rest.Crossword apps that do not contain simple and boring computer generated crosswords are rare.  Solvers have been heralding Haraldâs Crossword Rush puzzles on the Internet (see some comments below) and now we have finally finished the app for all of you.  Don't forget to check back here for updates and more crossword puzzle packs!This is a FREE app.  Download it now and start solving themed crosswords on or offline.  All crosswords are automatically saved upon exit and will be there as you left them each time you re-open the app.  Also, free real-world Kiip rewards (such as a free Starbucks coffee) will occasionally be offered to deserving solvers who attain certain achievement levels.  There are no ads in this app, only free real-world rewards that are offered to our good solvers that love crosswords.Here are some reviews of Harald Hornungâs crosswords:âI have emailed before but I have to tell you again this was the greatest puzzle ever.  Please make sure this website keeps them coming.  I wouldn't mind if I got one of your puzzles every day.   Love your stuff Harald.â â Teena BâHi. Thanks for making a truly 'easy' and enjoyable crossword. With so little time to relax, it's nice to find an easy that's fun and doesn't require me to stress out over the answers. Easy, themed puzzles are the perfect way to clear the cobwebs in the morning. thanks!â  - Lysa D.âGreat fun and loved the reinventing of the verbs to fit the themeâ â wichampiskyâHarald Hornung is the best constructor on this site.  Please post more puzzles.â  -SusanâThat was a fun puzzleâ  - storpyâFun!â  -audcapâIâve done all your puzzles so I hope you send some moreâ  -wichampisky âWell done!â  -ajâThat was fun ! I appreciate easy going puzzles to relax with after an insane work day(s).  Hope you do more like that.â  - wichampiskyâGood one.  Thank you.â  -jasadateâThank you for making the crossword puzzle. I enjoyed solving it.â  -pdqbachâYouâre good.  More of them please.â  -Tony DâThank you for your fine effort constructing this puzzle, I completed it with a 100% score!! keep them comingâ  -Eddie M.âHey HH, Another good one!! Keem em coming & thanks, AJâ  -AJâThanks again, HH. I enjoy your puzzles. Looking forward to more of them. Loisâ  - Lois S.

reviews.title: Love it.
reviews.comment: Works flawlessly on my LG phone. For future versions of this app I suggest puzzles of varying degrees of difficulty and an easy way to choose.
reviews.author: Michael Hey

reviews.title: NO VA
reviews.comment: App does not work on my Droid.  So many bugs I don\'t know where to start. Cannot get to Home or Start page at all. Just begin puzzles. Wrote to developer and no response. Far to go to match Shorty\'s.
reviews.author: Bob Gillingham

reviews.title: Great crossword puzzle app... with excellent puzzles!
reviews.comment: Enjoy this app every day now.  Great collection of quality puzzles that are easy enough to complete in a limited time, but still challenging enough to be interesting.
reviews.author: Diana Rives

reviews.title: Fun puzzles
reviews.comment: Highly recommended.  Great way to pass the time!
reviews.author: Clara Tsai

reviews.comment: I\'m enjoying the puzzles but can\'t figure pour how to easily close the app???
reviews.author: Erin Verbeeck

reviews.title: Fun little crosswords!
reviews.comment: I tried this out just recently, and it was a fun way to kill time. Works great. no problems with it.
reviews.author: Brad Sparks

reviews.title: Best crossword app out there
reviews.comment: Had some good times getting familiar with this app today. The puzzles are fun and really clever. Highly recommended!
reviews.author: Rich P

reviews.title: Game don\'t work
reviews.comment: I just downloaded this game five minutes ago it is not comparable with my phone puzzle I picked to do never came up my phone is a HTC sensation
reviews.author: Nelly Burgess

reviews.title: Love the fun themes!
reviews.comment: Great job HH!  Disclosure: HH is my brother :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun puzzles!
reviews.comment: Like how easy the app is to use.
reviews.author: David Pugh

reviews.title: Nice!
reviews.comment: Easy to use app with funny themes!
reviews.author: Stanley Wong

reviews.title: Marie
reviews.comment: Very buggy,needs updating. Im using 2.3.3 OS and its still buggy.
reviews.author: marie cassidy
